notes: Measurements are body measurements in centimeters. If hip and waist suggest different sizes, choose size based on hip measurement.
fit_notes: Adidas offers various fits including Regular, Slim, and Relaxed. If between sizes, size up for a looser fit or size down for a tighter fit.

measurement_guide.how_to_measure:
Waist: Measure around the narrowest part of your waist horizontally.
Hip: Measure around the fullest point of your hip with your feet together, keeping the tape parallel to the floor.
tips: If hip and waist measurements suggest different sizes, use hip measurement for bottoms
Consider intended fit (slim vs relaxed) when choosing size
